Uses of Class
suncertify.db.RecordNotFoundException

Packages that use RecordNotFoundException
suncertify.client Contains classes and interfaces related to the client layer in a RMI environment. 
suncertify.db Data access layer package (Sun's mandatory package). 
suncertify.db.impl Implementation of the interfaces defined in suncertify.db.spec package 
suncertify.db.spec Contains the specification of the main concerns identified for URLyBird data package (suncertify.db) 
suncertify.server.impl Base implementation of the interfaces defined in suncertify.server.spec package 
suncertify.server.spec Contains the specification of the main components used by the server
